title: My Kharcha : Daily Expenses, Income, PayTake Money

container.value: SR NO 9101/102 SHAANKESHWAR PALACE, FL NO A603 PUNE IN 411039

creator: CoEarth Technologies LLP
descriptionHtml:
My Kharcha (माय खर्चा) is an easy and simple expense manager app. It also helps you to record your incomes and track them against your expenses. You can use it as a udhari book or credit debit logger as well.

Why My Kharcha app?

• For Personal Finance

🛒 Add Expenses : Add your daily expenses spent on different things like food, shopping, grocery, etc. and manage your personal finance smartly. You can add expenditures only with few clicks.

💵 Add Income : Add all your incomes coming from different sources like salary, bonus, business profit, investment returns, property income, real estate, etc.

💸 Giving taking money / Debit credit / Credit len den / friends len den : You can add paying or taking money to and from friends. To get paid faster you can send them sms reminders as well.

📄 Download PDF report : You can download PDF report of your data. You can also download report of current month, or previous month or specific date range.

📊 View Colorful Chart : View your spending in colorful chart.

• For Business

📒 Debit credit / Credit len den / khata book udhar bahi khata / credit ledger account / udhari / udhar book : Add records with customer name and mobile number to keep track of paying and taking money to and from customer. To get paid faster, you can send them sms reminders as well.

📄 Download PDF report : Download all records in PDF file. You can also download report of current month, or previous month or specific date range.

Features of My Kharcha as a Personal Finance Manager App :

All In One Dashboard :
- Track expenses vs income
- Quickly check outstanding balance
- Easily view total spent of current day.
- Daily, weekly and monthly spending amount status
- Statistics to show spending alert

Add Items with Few Clicks :
- Faster way to add new items

Support Multiple Currencies :
- This app supports 8 different currencies - INR, USD, EURO, JPY, GBP, AUD, CAD, and CHE

Available In Multiple Languages :
- Support Marathi, Hindi and English

100% Safe & Secure Auto Data Backup :
- Auto daily backup
- Securely store on cloud
- Option to restore data from backups with few clicks

View Detailed Report of Spending :
- Shows daily, weekly, and monthly expenditure details

My Kharcha is used for personal expense manager, it can also be used as credit debit logger, ledger book, udhari book which is also called as udhari khata book.

My Kharcha can be misspelt to mykharcha, mykharch, kharcha, mykarcha, kharcha app, etc.

Tags:
daily expenses, expenses tracker, mykharcha, my khata, expense manager, finance manager

descriptionHtml:
Introducing My Kharcha (माय खर्चा), a user-friendly expense management and tracking app designed to help you effectively manage your finances. With its comprehensive features, it stands out as one of the best money manager apps available. Keep a record of your income and effortlessly track your expenses, all in one place. Create multiple accounts to monitor your daily expenditures and gain a clear understanding of your financial situation. 📉

My Kharcha is an innovative expense tracker and budget planner that provides valuable insights into your spending habits relative to your income. By logging your day-to-day expenses and categorizing them, you can eliminate unnecessary expenditures and strive for financial stability and a better lifestyle. This powerful budgeting tool allows you to calculate your income and daily expenses, enabling you to make informed financial decisions. With the help of intuitive graphs and charts, you can easily analyze your spending and earnings.

Whether you're using it as a credit-debit logger, personal finance manager, daily expense tracker, daily kharcha book, or a udhari book, My Kharcha simplifies your financial management. Just enter your expenses and income as you earn and spend, and let My Kharcha handle the calculations for you. With support for over 15 currencies, it is an ideal expense manager for users worldwide. Additionally, you can save reports and analyze your debit and credit transactions. 📉💰

Key Features of My Kharcha

All In One Dashboard
🔹 Track expenses versus income
🔹 Quickly check current month's balance and overall outstanding balance
🔹 Monitor daily, weekly, and monthly spendings

Analytics of Spending against Income
🔹 Gain insights into your spending patterns in relation to your income.

Payment Modes
🔹 Cash, credit card, UPI, cheque, net banking, and more.

Variety of Categories
🔹 Choose from a wide range of categories to classify your expenses accurately.

Multiple Accounts
🔹 Manage multiple accounts and view their respective expenses and income.

Add Items with Few Clicks

Support 16 Currencies
🔹 INR, USD, EURO, JPY, GBP, AUD, CAD, CHE, SGD, BND, AED, NZD, PKR, BDT, BRL, and PH PESO

Multiple languages
🔹 Choose your preferred language from Marathi, Hindi, or English.

Data Backup
🔹 Your data is securely backed up and can be easily restored.

View Detailed Reports
🔹 Access comprehensive reports that provide detailed information on your expenses.

Why Choose My Kharcha?

== For Personal Finance
🛒 Add Expenses: Effectively manage your personal finances by adding daily expenses for items such as food, shopping, and groceries.

💵 Add Income: Keep track of your income from various sources, including salary, bonuses, business profits, investment returns, etc.

Utilize My Kharcha's daily, weekly, and monthly budget planner to save money. Organize your family and business expenses with ease and confidence!

My Kharcha serves as a personal expense manager and can also be used as a credit-debit logger for businesses, a daily expense manager for students, an expense tracker for employees, a finance manager for accounting students, or as a ledger book or udhari book for shopkeepers and small business owners.
